Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class DriverController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.DriverController
@Controller public class DriverController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with contractors.
Since:
2/8/2022
Author:
Ian Black imb1007@sru.edu

      Constructor for DriverController.
      Instantiates the driverRepository
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • showDriversList

      @RequestMapping("/drivers") public String showDriversList(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds all of the drivers to the "drivers" model and redirects user to the drivers page.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "drivers"

    • showLists

      @GetMapping("/add-driver") public String showLists(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Driver drivers, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-driver page
      Adds all of the carriers, contacts, and vehicles to the model
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      drivers - Stores the information for the driver that is being added
      result - Ensures the input from the user are valid
      Returns:
      "/add/add-driver"

    • addDriver

      @RequestMapping("/adddriver") public String addDriver(@Validated Driver drivers, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a driver to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the driver is saved in the driverRepository. and the user is redirect to /drivers
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-driver page.
      Parameters:
      drivers - Stores the information of the driver that is to be added
      result - Ensures the inputs from the user are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/drivers" or "/add/add-driver"

    • deleteDriver

      @GetMapping("/deletedriver/{id}") public String deleteDriver(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a driver using the id parameter and if found, redirects user to confrimation page
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the driver to be deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/drivers"

    • deleteDriverConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deletedriverconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteDriverConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a driver using the id parameter and if found, deletes the driver and redirects to drivers page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the driver being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/drivers"

    • viewDriver

      @GetMapping("/viewdriver/{id}") public String viewDriver(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a driver using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that driver to the drivers page
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the driver to be viewed
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "drivers"

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editdriver/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a driver using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that driver to a form and redirects the user to that update form. Also adds the carriers, contacts, and drivers to the form.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the driver to be edited
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "update/update-driver"

    • updateDriver

      @PostMapping("/updatedriver/{id}") public String updateDriver(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated Driver driver, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates a driver to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the driver is updated in the driverRepository. and the user is redirected to /drivers
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-driver page.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the driver to be updated
      driver - Stores the information on the driver from the user
      result - Ensure the user inputs are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/contractor" or "/update/update-contractor"

    • getLoggedInUser

      public User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the user that is currently logged into the system.
      If there is no user logged in, null is returned.
      Returns:
      user2 or null
